name: engineio-as-websocket
description: Wraps Engine.IO to make it usable with the same API as WebSocket
author: fanout

scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib --presets es2015
scripts.build:umd: mkdir -p dist && cross-env BABEL_ENV=browserify NODE_ENV=development browserify src/browser.js -s EngineIoSocket -o dist/engineiosocket.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build:umd:min: mkdir -p dist && cross-env BABEL_ENV=browserify NODE_ENV=production browserify src/browser.js -s EngineIoSocket -o dist/engineiosocket.min.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -p [ minifyify --no-map ]
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
